ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: We thank Andrea Böszörményi for the GC-MS analysis and Prof. László Seress for great help with scanning electron microscopy. This work was financially supported by the Hungarian Government (MFCDiagn, TECH_08-A1-2008-0279) and by the University of Pécs (PTE ÁOK-KA-2013/23; PTE ÁOK-KA-2016-SGY). The present scientific contribution is dedicated to the 650th anniversary of the foundation of the University of Pécs, Hungary.
